divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). I THING IM BEING ABDUCTED BY ALIENS. I HAVE TWO RED DOTS ON MY LEFT HANDALONG A VEIN AND AN ABRASION ON MY RIST. THEY DONT HURT, THEYRE NOT LUMPS ORSCOOPS EITHER THEYRE JUST MARKS. SECOND, I EXIBIT MANY SYMPTOMS AS LISTED INABDUCTION BY JOHN E. MACK. UNREAL FEAR OF COMING NIGHT, FEAR OF BEING ALONE, IHAVE SLEPT WITH THE RADIO, TV, AND LIGHTS ON ALL MY LIFE OR HAVE SLEPT IN THESAME ROOM WITH MY SISTERS WHEN I WAS YOUNGER AND HAVE NO INTENTION OF STOPINGNOW. I AM MORTIFIED OF INSECTS. I OFTEN HAD NOSE BLEEDS AT NIGHT AS A CHILD ANDCONTINUE TO HAVE RECTAL IRRITATION ALMOST CONSTANTLY. SO BEFORE I READ THE BOOKI THOUGHT THERE IS SOME LOGICAL EXPLAINATION FOR THE MARKS. BUT WHEN I FOUNDCOMMON DESCRIPTION OF MY MOST PLAGUING FEARS I BEGAN TO REALLY WORRY THAT IMIGHT AWAKE TO ALIEN BEINGS
